Name: Reporting on crossing guard deployment.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting on crossing guard deployment.
Summary: This bill requires the NYPD to post a map to the Department website relating to crossing guard deployment in NYC.
Text:
Int. No. 992

By Council Members Lander, Gibson, Chin, Eugene, Lancman, Rose, Menchaca, Rosenthal, Greenfield, Rodriguez, Van Bramer and Richards

..Title
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting on crossing guard deployment.
..Body

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Section 14-118 is amended to add a new subparagraph b to read as follows:
      (b) a deployment map of the stationed crossing guard locations in New York City. Such map shall also be posted on the department website.
      ï¿½ 2. This local law shall take effect immediately after enactment

BG/RC
LS 4451/2015
11/6/15 10:30A

2
